trans-unit.source: Delegates all members of the <xref href="System.Configuration.Internal.IInternalConfigHost"></xref> interface to another instance of a host.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.Internal.DelegatingConfigHost"></xref> class.
Creates a new configuration context.
A string representing the path to a configuration file.
A string representing a location subpath.
A <xref:System.Object> representing a new configuration context.
Creates a deprecated configuration context.
A string representing the path to a configuration file.
A <xref:System.Object> representing a deprecated configuration context.
Decrypts an encrypted configuration section.
An encrypted section of a configuration file.
A <xref href="System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider"></xref> object.
A <xref href="System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationSection"></xref> object.
A string representing a decrypted configuration section.
Deletes the <xref:System.IO.Stream> object performing I/O tasks on a configuration file.
The name of a <xref:System.IO.Stream> object performing I/O tasks on a configuration file.
Encrypts a section of a configuration object.
A section of the configuration that is not encrypted.
A <xref href="System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider"></xref> object.
A <xref href="System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationSection"></xref> object.
A string representing an encrypted section of the configuration object.
Returns a configuration path based on a location subpath.
A string representing the path to a configuration file.
A string representing a location subpath.
A string representing a configuration path.
Returns a <xref:System.Type> representing the type of the configuration.
A string representing the configuration type.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if an exception should be thrown if an error is encountered; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if an exception should not be thrown if an error is encountered.
A <xref:System.Type> representing the type of the configuration.
Returns a string representing the type name of the configuration object.
A <xref:System.Type> object.
A string representing the type name of the configuration object.
Sets the specified permission set if available within the host object.
An <xref href="System.Configuration.Internal.IInternalConfigRecord"></xref> object.
A <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> object.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the host has finished initialization; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns the name of a <xref:System.IO.Stream> object performing I/O tasks on a configuration file.
A string representing the path to a configuration file.
A string representing the name of a <xref:System.IO.Stream> object performing I/O tasks on a configuration file.
Returns the name of a <xref:System.IO.Stream> object performing I/O tasks on a configuration source.
The name of a <xref:System.IO.Stream> object performing I/O tasks on a configuration file.
A string representing the configuration source.
A string representing the name of a <xref:System.IO.Stream> object performing I/O tasks on a configuration source.
Returns a <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.FileVersion*> object representing the version of a <xref:System.IO.Stream> object performing I/O tasks on a configuration file.
The name of a <xref:System.IO.Stream> object performing I/O tasks on a configuration file.
A <xref:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.FileVersion*> object representing the version of a <xref:System.IO.Stream> object performing I/O tasks on a configuration file.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Configuration.Internal.IInternalConfigHost"></xref> object.
A <xref href="System.Configuration.Internal.IInternalConfigHost"></xref> object.
Instructs the host to impersonate and returns an <xref:System.IDisposable> object required internally by the .NET Framework.
An <xref:System.IDisposable> value.
Initializes the configuration host.
An <xref href="System.Configuration.Internal.IInternalConfigRoot"></xref> object.
A parameter object containing the values used for initializing the configuration host.
Initializes the host for configuration.
A string representing a location subpath (passed by reference).
A string representing the path to a configuration file.
The location configuration path.
The configuration root element.
A parameter object representing the parameters used to initialize the host.
Returns a value indicating whether the configuration is above the application configuration in the configuration hierarchy.
A string representing the path to a configuration file.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the configuration is above the application configuration in the configuration hierarchy; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns a value indicating whether a configuration record is required for the host configuration initialization.
A string representing the path to a configuration file.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a configuration record is required for the host configuration initialization; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Restricts or allows definitions in the host configuration.
A string representing the path to a configuration file.
The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationAllowDefinition"></xref> object.
The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationAllowExeDefinition"></xref> object.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the grant or restriction of definitions in the host configuration was successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns a value indicating whether the file path used by a <xref:System.IO.Stream> object to read a configuration file is a valid path.
The name of a <xref:System.IO.Stream> object performing I/O tasks on a configuration file.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the path used by a <xref:System.IO.Stream> object to read a configuration file is a valid path; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

Returns a value indicating whether a configuration section requires a fully trusted code access security level and does not allow the <xref:System.Security.AllowPartiallyTrustedCallersAttribute> attribute to disable implicit link demands.
The <xref href="System.Configuration.Internal.IInternalConfigRecord"></xref> object.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the configuration section requires a fully trusted code access security level and does not allow the <xref:System.Security.AllowPartiallyTrustedCallersAttribute> attribute to disable implicit link demands; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns a value indicating whether the initialization of a configuration object is considered delayed.
The <xref href="System.Configuration.Internal.IInternalConfigRecord"></xref> object.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the initialization of a configuration object is considered delayed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns a value indicating whether the configuration object supports a location tag.
A string representing the path to a configuration file.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the configuration object supports a location tag; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets a value indicating whether the configuration is remote.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the configuration is remote; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns a value indicating whether a configuration path is to a configuration node whose contents should be treated as a root.
A string representing the path to a configuration file.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the configuration path is to a configuration node whose contents should be treated as a root; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns a value indicating whether the configuration path is trusted.
A string representing the path to a configuration file.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the configuration path is trusted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Opens a <xref:System.IO.Stream> object to read a configuration file.
The name of a <xref:System.IO.Stream> object performing I/O tasks on a configuration file.
Returns the object specified by streamName.
Opens a <xref:System.IO.Stream> object to read a configuration file.
The name of a <xref:System.IO.Stream> object performing I/O tasks on a configuration file.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to assert permissions; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns the object specified by streamName.
Opens a <xref:System.IO.Stream> object for writing to a configuration file or for writing to a temporary file used to build a configuration file.
Allows a <xref:System.IO.Stream> object to be designated as a template for copying file attributes.
The name of a <xref:System.IO.Stream> object performing I/O tasks on a configuration file.
The name of a <xref:System.IO.Stream> object from which file attributes are to be copied as a template.
The write context of the <xref:System.IO.Stream> object (passed by reference).
A <xref:System.IO.Stream> object.
Opens a <xref:System.IO.Stream> object for writing to a configuration file.
Allows a <xref:System.IO.Stream> object to be designated as a template for copying file attributes.
The name of a <xref:System.IO.Stream> object performing I/O tasks on a configuration file.
The name of a <xref:System.IO.Stream> object from which file attributes are to be copied as a template.
The write context of the <xref:System.IO.Stream> object performing I/O tasks on the configuration file (passed by reference).
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to assert permissions; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns the object specified by the streamName parameter.
Returns a value indicating whether the entire configuration file could be read by a designated <xref:System.IO.Stream> object.
A string representing the path to a configuration file.
The name of a <xref:System.IO.Stream> object performing I/O tasks on a configuration file.
if the entire configuration file could be read by the object designated by streamName; otherwise, .
Instructs the <xref href="System.Configuration.Internal.IInternalConfigHost"></xref> object to read a designated section of its associated configuration file.
A string representing the name of a section group in the configuration file.
A string representing the name of a section in the configuration file.
if a section of the configuration file designated by the sectionGroupName and sectionName parameters can be read by a object; otherwise, .
Indicates that a new configuration record requires a complete initialization.
An <xref href="System.Configuration.Internal.IInternalConfigRecord"></xref> object.
Instructs the host to monitor an associated <xref:System.IO.Stream> object for changes in a configuration file.
The name of a <xref:System.IO.Stream> object performing I/O tasks on a configuration file.
A <xref href="System.Configuration.Internal.StreamChangeCallback"></xref> object to receive the returned data representing the changes in the configuration file.
An <xref:System.Object> instance containing changed configuration settings.
Instructs the host object to stop monitoring an associated <xref:System.IO.Stream> object for changes in a configuration file.
The name of a <xref:System.IO.Stream> object performing I/O tasks on a configuration file.
A <xref href="System.Configuration.Internal.StreamChangeCallback"></xref> object.
Gets a value indicating whether the host configuration supports change notifications.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the host supports change notifications; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets a value indicating whether the host configuration supports location tags.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the host supports location tags; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets a value indicating whether the host configuration has path support.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the host configuration has path support; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets a value indicating whether the host configuration supports refresh.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the host configuration supports refresh; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Verifies that a configuration definition is allowed for a configuration record.
A string representing the path to a configuration file.
An <xref:System.Configuration.SectionInformation.AllowDefinition*> object.
A <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationAllowExeDefinition"></xref> object
An <xref href="System.Configuration.Internal.IConfigErrorInfo"></xref> object.
Indicates that all writing to the configuration file has completed.
The name of a <xref:System.IO.Stream> object performing I/O tasks on a configuration file.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if writing to the configuration file completed successfully; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The write context of the <xref:System.IO.Stream> object performing I/O tasks on the configuration file.
Indicates that all writing to the configuration file has completed and specifies whether permissions should be asserted.
The name of a <xref:System.IO.Stream> object performing I/O tasks on a configuration file.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that writing was completed successfully; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The write context of the <xref:System.IO.Stream> object performing I/O tasks on the configuration file.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to assert permissions; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
